metadata.Title: CVE-2022-22815 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
path_getbbox in path.c in Pillow before 9.0.0 improperly initializes ImagePath.Path.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-22815` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 7.0.0-4ubuntu0.5
python3-pil.imagetk - 7.0.0-4ubuntu0.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.0.0-4ubuntu0.5').
pillow-python2 package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
